::Vamprah::

Vamprah noticed horrified that her probe was out control and a=
n Alliance member was closest of it, she typed desperatly trying to get the=
 control of it again. When she knew that all her attpems would unsusceesful=
ly she push a red button and the probe exploted.

"Now, I could be in jaws"=
 Vamprah though. 

A big Shadow moved behind her, she spun her chair and sa=
w at her huge creation. The male bot emited a sort of roar, Vamprah smiled =
and said "Are you thirsy my dear? Don't worry, soon you will drink all Meta=
l fluid that you wish"
